long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small extension for http://www.starkingdoms.com that makes the browser based strategy game more fun to play. Though not much can change that. For something better try out: http://www.empireassault.com

Fixes some known errors in the game, broken links, barracks capacity being wrong. 

Adds links that let you explore, build, train and probe the best amounts with the click of a button.

Adds supplemental data to a number of pages.

Also check out my newbiesim: http://newbiesim.jwjacobs88.com
